original_title: The Good, The Bad, and The Nasty
overview: In the days of the Old West, men were men, women were saloon dancers and sex was always a bronco buckin' adventure. So it makes sense that when these cowpokes ride into town for a little action, they shoot straight - and not with their guns!
tagline: What They'll Do For A Few Dollars More...
title: The Good, The Bad, and The Nasty
